changes: Adds support for split topbar menus to accommodate instances where the navigation requires visual distinction.
Updates the development and production tasks to include Babel, allowing for the component to be imported as a module or browser-ready JavaScript.
Migrates away from $H2VER, $H2VERJS, and $H2VERCSS to a standardized _VERSION signifier for the build scripts.
Updates the way menu padding is calculated to use the core padding variable.
Reconfigures the build script to output into a new folder layout containing the version and latest code in matching structures.
Removes the init script as it's no longer needed.

Fixes a bug where setting the menu background theme variable to a semi-transparent value would break the styling and ruin the mobile experience; updates the Sass so that the menu respects the RGB value on mobile, but sets the alpha value to 1, while respecting the user value on desktop.
